title: Companies (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Covid-19) Act 2020) in section 2 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Section 12A(1))
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Section 12A(1)) 

(Covid-19) (No. 2) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited company act 2014 (section 12a(1)) (covid-19) (no 2) order 2022

title: Companies (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Covid-19) Act 2020) in section 2 of
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2020” means the Companies (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2020” means the Companies (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) (Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 9 of 2020).
text_norm: 2 order act 2020 mean company (miscellaneous provisions) (covid-19) act 2020 (no 9 2020)

title: Companies (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Covid-19) Act 2020) in section 2 of
heading: 3. The period beginning on 1 January 2023 and ending on 31 December
text_raw:
3. The period beginning on 1 January 2023 and ending on 31 December 
2023 is hereby specified as the period to which the interim period as defined in 
section 2 (amended by section 3 of the Act of 2020) of the Companies Act 
2014 (No. 38 of 2014) shall be extended in respect of the amendments effected 
by the following sections of the Act of 2020: 

(a) 

sections 3 and 4; 

(b) 

sections 6 to 9; 

(c) 

section 11; 

(d) 

sections 14 to 16; 

(e) 

sections 18 to 25. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

7 December, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
